title: API Docs: Automated generation
body:
## Summary
Implement automated API documentation generation for all gRPC services and protobuf definitions. Support multiple formats and an interactive API explorer.

## Requirements
- Generate HTML, Markdown, and PDF docs
- Provide interactive API explorer
- Ensure cross-module service mapping
- Automate docs pipeline on code changes

## References
- tasks/20-api-documentation-generation.md
